abstracts.cdata!:
The project is for the construction of
            new, and expansion of existing, secondary, technical and
            teacher training schools, together with student hostels,
            staff houses and the purchase of furniture and equipment.
            The project covers all capital investment in these fields in
            Ethiopia in the next 4-1/2 years. The estimated total cost
            of the project, including consultant fees and allowances for
            contingencies, is $11 million. The proposed credit of $7.2
            million would cover all the estimated foreign exchange costs
            ($3.8 million) and roughly half the local expenditures, with
            the result that the Association would finance two-thirds of
            the project cost and the Government the remainder. The
            project would be completed by the end of 1970.
